lenders.name: Paul and Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy giving people the opportunity to achieve their goals. Joining with many other people from around the world in contributing to each loan is also very satisfying.
lenders.occupational_info: We work with drug-dependent people

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.  Something which is (relatively) small to you can make a huge difference to someone else.  Besides, I could do with the Karma points ;o)

lenders.name: Boaz
lenders.loan_because: I want to honor the memory of my younger brother, Asher.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I support the kids at Moberly who support KIVA
lenders.occupational_info: retired teacher

lenders.name: Susannah
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art history

lenders.name: jack
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to loan a limited amount so why not !

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with my health, my family and a good job.  I first heard about this idea when I read about Muhammad Yunus and his Grameen Bank winning the Nobel Peace Prize in 2006.  I think it is a wonderful concept to help people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sales and have a group of products that I promote around the west coast. My products help other companies to make medicine and vaccines.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I like how easy it makes it to help others improve their lives, and to give something back.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Sammi
lenders.loan_because: I think the small things each person does in life can make a big impact on the lives of others.

lenders.name: Corina
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the ways to give back and know that I am making a difference in someone's life and future.

lenders.name: Sean & Jenny
lenders.loan_because: because I have so much and want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Connecting people to Jesus by connecting them to one another

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual to affect change.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a designer of parks, trails and public spaces.  I work with the rocks and trees as well as bricks and mortar to create a more beautiful world for man and beast.

lenders.name: Dana druid
lenders.loan_because:
Locale does not matter- we are family.

A family shares what they have.

The harvest of sharing is prosperity and harmony.
lenders.occupational_info: Healing the environment. (Nature is good.)

lenders.name: Ming
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching and Research

lenders.name: Patricia & Marcial
lenders.loan_because: I think we can all make the difference no matter how small our contribution.  Together we make a strong force in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world, raising my three children. It's the hardest job there is but the rewards are enormous.  I'm doing what fulfills me as a human being and that is being a mom.

lenders.name: Jon Rosenberg & family
lenders.loan_because: It helps people develop their own businesses and make a sustainable living with dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the director of a Jewish nonprofit organization that drives volunteering and service-learning programs around the world.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: The world needs more GMO Free food options!
lenders.occupational_info: GMO Free for my health and for our children's future.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides an amazing way to help people achieve their goals, giving them the tools to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student.  I also had the wonderful opportunity to work with Kiva in the field as a Kiva Fellow in Benin City, Nigeria.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.occupational_info: I verify that computer programs work.

lenders.name: Magic
lenders.loan_because: Ever since I was a pup I knew it was better to give than receive.
lenders.occupational_info: Guide dog for a wonderful young woman.

lenders.name: Kevin George
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurs.  I believe that one of the answers for global poverty is supplying the daring with the means to act upon their dreams.   I salute those who are brave enough to start their own businesses and believe in the power of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who is blessed enough to have been born into a privileged world that many can only imagine.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: It is unfair that living on one side of a line and not the other can have a great influence on an individual's quality of life and the opportunities available to them.  No one, not even those in the poorest of countries should be denied the ability to make a living for themselves due to lack of financing.

lenders.name: Husny
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a singer in a music band that plays at casinos in Melbourne Australia and i write songs and make music to sell.

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel happy
lenders.occupational_info: i look after children and young people who are not able to live with their own families

lenders.name: Sumit
lenders.loan_because: my family and I believe that such efforts will strive to improve the life of so many folks.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working as a project manager responsibile for the introduction of a new drug in the North American market.  It is approximately a three year project and is currently in the project initiation phase.

lenders.name: oladimeji
lenders.loan_because: i want to invest information marketing to empower the masses in my country in the little way i can .i intend to use multi marketing system (MMS) to pay my clients . the package will sell business kit that will offer training on entreprenuership with cash for referal and bonuses
lenders.occupational_info: my work is info marketing and training of entreprenuers for maximising their potentials and cash

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: I identify with an entrepreneurial spirit and want to help women find financial independence.  I have a passion for knitting that I hope might someday become more than a hobby, so I especially look to support textile and fiber-arts enterprises.
lenders.occupational_info: I write web-based software used by companies like Coke to get the most out of their advertising budget.  It's not as boring as it sounds, but it is challenging!

lenders.name: Sandeep
lenders.loan_because: It helps.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on making displays using micro (very small) machines for wireless applications. I'm into research and development.

lenders.name: Jim & Char
lenders.loan_because: We have seen how even small amounts of money at the right time can make a difference in a person's life. If we can contribute to that difference in some way, we want to do so.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker and a writer, formerly of Manchester, Conn. I advocated for public understanding of the circumstances and needs of battered women. I'm retired now, and I still participate in the battered women's movement, but in different ways. I'm involved in other organizations that support  educational, nutritional and financial programs for women.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I have been lifted out of poverty and I want to help others.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I realize that there are actions that we take, whether good or bad, that have a direct impact on the lives of others around the world. This loan is a positive action that I hope will have a positive impact on someone's life. I may not be able to change the world at large, but I can change someone's life. For me, that it where it all begins.

lenders.name: Desiree
lenders.loan_because: It´s the easiest way to help people all over the world...

lenders.name: Ananda and Skye
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women make a better life for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to plan our health services so that people have fair access to the medical support they need.

lenders.name: Sandy Penny
lenders.occupational_info: Call Center

lenders.name: Mashenka
lenders.loan_because: however crappy my day is, however stupid my life might feel like sometimes - I live in one of the richest countries in the world and live a great life compared to many - so this is really the least I can do. And lets be honest, this is what credit cards should be used for.
lenders.occupational_info: From the rains of Manchester, UK to the sun of Los Angeles...

lenders.name: Kecia
lenders.loan_because: I have been given many gifts and giving back is my responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: Counselor

lenders.name: Eli
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: MKM
lenders.loan_because: I have been to many places in the world and I want to help those in places I've been and also those in places I would like to go.

lenders.name: Heike
lenders.loan_because: I read about Kiva in a magazine. For some time now I have been looking for an opportunity to do something that has a direct effect. Thanks for providing this opportunity!

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone drastically improve their life simply by lending them money in a responsible manner.

lenders.name: Dustine
lenders.loan_because: I am a grateful product of the many emotional, spiritual, and financial investments of people who have cared for my well-being. We are all in this together-we are all a part of a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: Meaningful

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: its fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage translation projects.

lenders.name: Meike
lenders.loan_because: The best idea for an active help I've heard from the last months.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I feel everyone should have a chance to make dreams come true!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom.  Owning our own business allows me to do this.

lenders.name: Paige and Roger
lenders.occupation: womens clothing store owner and software manager
lenders.loan_because: Because for some reason GOD has graced us with all we need. It is now our responsibility to help others attain what they need!

lenders.name: Khristine
lenders.loan_because: We are all responsible for one another, all brothers and sisters on this journey.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to talk with people who have lost their housing, and to try to help them. There are many who have lost their housing where I live, because our town on the seacoast has become too expensive for most people. We build housing so they can continue to live in their community.

lenders.name: Laurent
lenders.loan_because: Small change can make a better world.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: i like to give opportunities to other people
lenders.occupational_info: entrepreneurial, technical, interesting

lenders.name: Kenny
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Jack

It brings joy to me and to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I love people, volunteering, photography, the beach, cooking and eating.

lenders.name: albert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that I have an obligation to share and help others who would do the same for me. Helping one      person indirectly helps everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: My retired interests include family, children  and grandchildren, gardening and growing trees.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped in the past.
lenders.occupational_info: I board (take care of ) horses for other people and raise flower bulbs to sell.

lenders.occupational_info: I help a medical doctor who is researching cancer prevention.

lenders.name: Sierra & Family
lenders.loan_because: We've been given a lot and we want to help others.

lenders.name: Monica B.

lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of my work day at home on the computer or on the telephone.  Occasionally I meet with my customers at their place of business which is usually a library.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: There is such joy in knowing my small loans may give people a chance to have a better life... my money is His money and I want to give it back to Him... he who is gracious to the poor lends to the Lord... Proverbs 19:17
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick newborn babies

lenders.name: Carvel
lenders.loan_because: I like getting to know the people and assisting their endeavors at the same time.

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and now concentrate on my painting.

lenders.name: Williams Family
lenders.loan_because: We're learning together how to help others.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to empower women and keep my donations multiplying.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with at-risk youth.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: Love the idea of helping people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a family doctor

lenders.name: Barinder Sall
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes just a little money can make a big difference in the life of a person.

its a good thing to do...   
the lord gives and the lord takes away,,,, blessed be the name of the lord,,,,,              Go Jesus,,,,  you Rock!!!

And seeing how spoiled american kids are with all of their toys my little girl included I feel if maybe I can help make a family or child smile and not ever fear or hate the people of america

lenders.name: Ron, Zoe & Kiana

lenders.loan_because: Im a bit lazy and have a good chance of getting it back but also the people i lend to are earning it.  Its not a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure people have the correct tickets on londons bus'es.  I might have to issue a fine or just help someone who is lost.

lenders.loan_because: We are all God children and every father want the best for their children’s, how could I as a son of my heavenly father not lend a helping hand, to my brother and sister of the world who want to better the life of themselves and their family. Responsible for buying all of the electronic item such as computer, phone, cell phone etc. I work with people of different race, personality and altitudes

lenders.name: Carole

lenders.name: Kenny
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone who can should - It takes so little from me and it means so much to the people working hard to make a independant living.This is Globalization at it's best !  I'm proud to be able to help a little.
lenders.occupational_info: I am independant working as a consultant in the Telco industry

lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help someone be self sufficient. I feel like Ive been so fortunate and feels great to extend a hand.

lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help someone have his own job and grow up

lenders.loan_because: I can and I like helping people help themselves. It is always amazing to see how a small contribution makes such a difference a person's life...

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: "Believe in yourselves. Dream. Try. Do good."- G.F.

lenders.name: Ariane

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to have a personal  connection with people I am helping. It's very exciting.

lenders.name: JoAnn

lenders.occupational_info: We are "women inspiring women to wellness". Our goal is to uplift women to their highest potential, in mind, body & spirit. Namaste.

lenders.loan_because: It brings my heart so much joy to be able to help someone change their life for the better and to support their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently write for Sacramento Reason, read voraciously, and am attempting to learn to cook food that won't leave my poor test subjects turning all shades of green.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to.

lenders.name: Deborah

lenders.name: Mari Lynn

lenders.name: Anne

lenders.name: Body & Soul
lenders.loan_because:
A company you can feel good about, Body & Soul is a small, woman-owned and women-run business. We are committed to helping women in business both locally and globally; from sourcing our ingredients to donating a portion of our proceeds to supporting women worldwide. Additionally, most of our products are manufactured in the USA with the exception of a few in Canada. Our ingredients are easy on the environment and your body, and our packaging uses no unnecessary elements and is always recyclable. Our commitment is three-fold:

Product: We believe our healthy, effective, and high-quality product can help women feel good and put their best self forward. We donate our product to organizations that help women start or return to the workforce or educational environment.

Action: Personal commitment to support organizations that mentor, educate, and train women in business and the workforce by donating a portion of our time and profits.

Profitability: Being a financially sustainable business is the only way we are able to support our social and environmental missions. Remaining profitable is just one component of Body & Soul’s commitment to giving back and improving our world over time. 

We thank you for being a Body & Soul customer.
lenders.occupational_info: Body & Soul creates quality, natural hair care products that produce salon results. We pledge to create products that make you feel beautiful, inside and out while striving to contribute to a better community and planet.

lenders.name: Chloe
lenders.loan_because: what we do matters.
lenders.occupational_info: I study at a university.

lenders.loan_because: I want to give hope to people and opportunities for better life and a little bit of happiness.
